review.title: Development of knowledge Base Expert System for Natural treatment of Diabetes disease
review.abstract: The development of expert system for treatment of Diabetes disease by using natural methods is new information technology derived from Artificial Intelligent research using ESTA (Expert System Text Animation) System. The proposed expert system contains knowledge about various methods of natural treatment methods (Massage, Herbal/Proper Nutrition, Acupuncture, Gems) for Diabetes diseases of Human Beings. The system is developed in the ESTA (Expert System shell for Text Animation) which is Visual Prolog 7.3 Application. The knowledge for the said system will be acquired from domain experts, texts and other related sources.

sections.heading: B. Gaining Knowledge
sections.text: The acquired knowledge is analyzed and processed in order to give the best solution to the problem. The knowledge about different types of natural treatments (massage, acupuncture, plant / correct nutrition and gems) of diabetes was gained by reading books, surfing the Internet and also by consulting doctors in their respective fields.

sections.heading: C. Representation of Knowledge
sections.text: Each knowledge base contains rules for a specific area. For the natural treatment of the diabetes expert system, the knowledge base contains rules relating to certain natural treatments of diabetes such as massage, acupuncture, plant / correct nutrition and vegetables. ESTA has all the possibilities to write the rules that make up a knowledge base. In addition, ESTA has an inference engine that can use the rules in the knowledge base to determine what advice should be given to the user of the expert system or to initiate other measures.The representation in ESTA is the rule based on the logical paradigm of simple if-then rules in the backward or forward concatenation. We have here the backward concatenation for the presentation of knowledge with simple if-do pairs instead of ithen rules.
